entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight then light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
